title: Back out "Add strides to Tensor (#11763)" and dependent changes
body_html:
Stack:
    ⚫️  #12234 Back out "Add strides to Tensor (#11763)" and dependent changes  💛

Back out "Move TensorImpl IsType, meta, dim32, dim, ExtractDeviceOption to caffe2::Tensor"
Original commit changeset: 5986e92ea54e

Back out "Move TensorImpl size_from_dim, size_to_dim, size_between_dim, canonical_axis_index to caffe2::Tensor"
Original commit changeset: e3d571bf8fea

Back out "Back out "[pytorch][PR] Revert "Move CreateContext to global registry (#11688)"""
Original commit changeset: ca9f4b2f7ef0

Back out "Move TensorImpl ndim, size, itemsize and nbytes to caffe2::Tensor"
Original commit changeset: a833fad74bbd

Back out "Implement caffe2::Tensor::raw_data() in terms of data()"
Original commit changeset: b4b61869363a

Back out "Move TensorImpl::ShareExternalPointer helper overloads to caffe2::Tensor"
Original commit changeset: a9b95d00512a

Back out "Move TensorImpl::DebugString() to caffe2::Tensor"
Original commit changeset: f56b6fc5d1cb

Back out "Move TensorImpl::Reshape(vector) to caffe2::Tensor"
Original commit changeset: 87fb91f31c33

Back out "Fix bug where Reshape() trashes strides."
Original commit changeset: c36d1c8d12fb

Back out "Move TensorImpl::ResizeLike to caffe2::Tensor"
Original commit changeset: 772ecd2e377f

Back out "Move TensorImpl::ShrinkTo to caffe2::Tensor"
Original commit changeset: b99233e21c9f

Back out "Move ExtendTo to caffe2::Tensor from TensorImpl"
Original commit changeset: 843067aacfa2

Back out "Rename TensorImpl::GetDeviceType to device_type, and properly test if is_variable"
Original commit changeset: 0b6c9d7caf3b

Back out "Merge UndefinedTensorImpl."
Original commit changeset: 6b4645c9d4bb

Back out "Deduplicate canonical_axis_index_ with maybe_wrap_dim"
Original commit changeset: 13c98fff0880

Back out "Merge TensorImpl."
Original commit changeset: 9c74032e0111

Back out "Add strides to Tensor (#11763)"
Original commit changeset: c462e770a4b4

Differential Revision: D10134083
